name: Laughing Gnoll
summary: A gnoll's sinister giggle is a sound of warning and threat.
description:
A gnoll's sinister giggle is a sound of warning and threat. You gain the Battle Cry skill feat. You don't take a penalty when you attempt to Demoralize a creature that doesn't understand your language.Traits

Gnoll: Gnolls are humanoids that resemble hyenas.
